professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server DBA with expertise in high-availability solutions, including mirroring and log-shipping. Proficient in database performance tuning, query optimization, and automated maintenance tasks.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured SQL Server 2008 Enterprise edition on an Active/Passive Cluster environment.
Migrated databases from SQL Server 2005 to 2008 across development
Applied patches and hotfixes on production servers.
Implemented Resource Governor for better performance.
Applied Page and Row Compression to optimize database space.
Developed automated maintenance tasks including backups
Monitored database performance and implemented efficiency improvements.
Reduced deadlocks using SQL Server Profiler and Trace flags.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Systems Engineering and Management
Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering
